entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 29 except minus 34 inland.
